Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Maximin 2  (natural AMPs; UCLL1c; XXA; toad, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Chinese red belly toad,Bombina maxima, Yunnan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), B. pyocyaneus CMCCB10104 (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), B. megatherium (MIC 19.5 ug/ml), B. dysenterium (MIC 2.7 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae (MIC 9 ug/ml), and C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 3 uM), A.flavus IFFI4015 (ND), and P.uticale IFFI2001 (ND).
Literature Information.Author: Lai R, Zheng Y-T, Shen J-H, Liu GJ, Liu H, Lee W-H, Tang S-Z., Zhang Y.2002.
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from skin secretions of Chinese red belly toad Bombina maxima.
